tiles.name: Rishi Block
tiles.description: Dilapidated apartment complex, Rishi family residence. Concrete and makeshift dwellings. Hot, humid, and polluted. Crowded corridors, graffiti.

tiles.name: Black Market Sector
tiles.description: Illicit marketplace. Metal grating and accumulated garbage. Hot, humid, and polluted. Crowded corridors, illicit marketplaces.

tiles.name: Waste Disposal Zone
tiles.description: Waste disposal chutes. Concrete and pipes. Hot, humid, and polluted. Accumulation of garbage and debris.

tiles.name: Collapsed Tunnel Section
tiles.description: Collapsed section of infrastructure. Concrete, pipes and wires, debris. Hot, humid, and polluted. Forgotten technology caches.

tiles.name: Grimy Skylight Block
tiles.description: Apartments with grimy skylights. Concrete, makeshift dwellings. Hot, humid, and polluted. Graffiti and propaganda.

tiles.name: Power Generator Hub
tiles.description: Makeshift power generators. Metal grating, pipes and wires. Hot, humid, and polluted. Makeshift power generators.

tiles.name: Resistance Hideout Block
tiles.description: Block of makeshift dwellings. Concrete and metal grating. Hot, humid, and polluted. Resistance cell hideouts (hidden rooms/tunnels).

tiles.name: Omni-Net Terminal Area
tiles.description: Area with broken Omni-Net surveillance cameras and terminals. Metal grating and pipes. Hot, humid, and polluted. Omni-Net surveillance cameras and terminals (broken/partially functional).

tiles.name: Water Leak Junction
tiles.description: Junction with leaking pipes and wires. Concrete, metal grating. Hot, humid, and polluted. Limited access to clean water.
